transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir Shivam baat kar raha tha na IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan Shivam bataiye.
Executive: Ji ji sir maine baat kiya tha aapke senior se to wo bol rahe the refund to possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: Dekhiye sir refund to jaruri hai kyuki maine jinse baat ki thi unhone ye bataya tha process mujhe to agar aapko aisa lagta hai kyuki mera running business shuru hone wala tha isliye maine kiya ye. Ab aap unhone confirm kiya tha aap.
Executive: Basically sahi baat hai unhone bola hoga main ye cheez aap agar kahin likha mention kar rakha hai unhone to aap mujhe ek baar share kar sakte ho. Because maine apne senior se hi discuss kiya sir wo bol rahe hain ki refund to possible nahi hai sir to bolo ki abhi use kare lead wagera.
Customer: Main lead kyun use karunga bhai lead to tab use karunga jab main business product deliver karunga clients ko. Mera relation kharab karne ke liye thodi na lead use karunga.
Executive: Sir baat aapki theek hai lekin ab wo cheez to lead ka koi utilization hi nahi hai jab hum deliver hi nahi kar rahe hain aap mera record bhi check kar lo hum kitne active hain shuru mein ek do mahine baad hum active hi nahi hai ab mujhe pata hai abhi teen mahine hue isliye update de do agli aath mahine jab main kuch karne ja raha nahi ja raha hu to main kya karunga aapki lead ka. Aap senior ko bolo mere se baat hui thi jis din unhone registration karaya unse aap confirm karo unhone bola tha agar teen char mahine aapka business run nahi karega to hum refund bhi kar sakte hain aur baar baar insist kiya tha tabhi maine payment kiya tha unko. At that time main pehle hi sure tha ki ho sakta bhi hai aur nahi bhi ho sakta hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap please pura verify karo aap jinhone wo cheez aapki jo ye karwaya tha. Likha hoga mere mujhse do teen log contact kar rahe the aap do teen logo se contact karo ye jinhone process mera pura likha hua hai jisne registration kiya kisne kiya tha wo mere paas email wagera sab aayi thi aap record check kar lo usme unka naam hoga kyuki naam to wo log batate nahi baat karte hain mujhe kya pata inse lekin jinhone kiya tha unhone mera confirm kiya tha aap internally baat karke fir mujhe batana.
Executive: Sir aap service hi nahi le raha hu aur service hi nahi le raha hu thoda bahut paisa hota to main bhul jata do char paanch hajar rupay yaar 33 35 hajar rupay mere ko gaya hai tax wagera mila ke maine diya hai to mera fayda kya hai usko aath mahine mein baitha hu. Ye koi matlab hi nahi hai mana karne ka.
Executive: Sir mana karne wala. Possibility wale possible word matlab possible word bolne nahi chahiye face hote hain different different possibility agar main kahun bhai maine use bhi kiya aapka platform aur baad me paisa de do aap logo ne mere liye mehnat ki hai. Senior se ye cheez maine apne senior se yahi cheez boli ki aap lead consume kar bhi loge to lekin aap apne product ko matlab bech bhi sakte ho.
Customer: Bhai maine dobara aap yahan registration kiya dobara se aur main unko client ko contact kar raha hu mera record kharab ho jayega company ka market mein. Baat matlab kya hua main lead kar raha hu aur deliver kar nahi raha hu lead nati nahi kar raha hu mana kar raha hu to market mein company ka naam kharab hota hai to main kyun utrunga abhi.
Executive: Theek hai na lead.
Customer: Aapka platform use karne ka koi matlab hi nahi hai mere paas aur aap record bhi dekh lo aaj din mere paas kai call aati rahi maine socha chal jayega ek do mahine aur try karte hain maine ekdam turant nahi mana kiya July mein payment kiya tha abhi teen mahine hue hain August September October. Mera September tak maine try kiya uske baad mujhe dedh mahine mujhe lag gaya ki kuch nahi kar hi nahi paunga main to fir maine ab decision aake liya November first week mein ki mujhe hold karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap aur ye jinhone mere ko registration diya tha unka aap verify kar lo kisne kya kara unhone mere ko confirm kiya tha tabhi maine payment ki thi unko.
Executive: Sir but aur mere paas mein unhone screenshot bhi bheja tha ek bande ka jinhone refund kiya hai.
Customer: Hmm. Refund company ne diya hai unko ye sab proof ke baad mein hi 100% main confident ho gaya tha tabhi maine payment hi kiya.
Executive: Sir main ab aap log u turn mat lo ispe kyuki aap log main ye bol raha hu sir main ek baar na call back arrange kar leta hu kyuki maine kal ye cheez matlab meri jo senior mam hai unko maine bola tha ye cheez ki aap agar matlab lead consume karoge to aap deliver nahi kar sakte ho ye cheez aapka concern aa raha hai.
Customer: Simple ye hai ki unka business abhi aath nau mahine nahi chalne ja raha hai to wo lead kyun consume karenge kyun time denge.
Executive: Hmm. Sir lekin IndiaMART pe aap sir basically IndiaMART pe to kafi logo ko visibility ke liye bhi dete hain sir. Matlab visibility ke liye mere ko koi benefit nahi maine unse uss samay kaha tha mujhe monthly de do ho sakta hai chale uss mahine se main nahi karunga lekin wo full payment is base pe hi liya tha ki agar sir aapko koi dikkat hogi to wapas refund kar denge.
Customer: Main to monthly package aake lene wala tha sununga monthly package hai hi nahi aap ye full package hum aapko de rahe hain lekin agar aapko lagta hai business nahi hai to chala to aapko refund kar denge.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap please verify karo unke aapke logo ne kaha hai mere se tabhi maine payment kiya fir pura. Main verify to karwa lunga main isliye bol raha hu ki ek baar main abhi aap free ho to aap mujhe paanch minute do main ek baar call back arrange karwa deta hu. Nahi mere se arrange karane ki nahi hai to main jo hai dekho maine bata diya maine ye bhi bata diya main aap phone karoge call nahi kar rahe ho to main bol dunga bhai maine pehle hi bol rakha hai ki main business nahi chala raha hu aap aath nau mahine tale rakho koi dikkat nahi lekin main paisa 30 35 hajar bahut hota hai yaar.
Executive: Hota hai main sir maine already aapka concern highlight kar rakha hai sir ki aap cheeze aapki bhi ho pa rahi hai isliye to lekin ab ye ki ek baar aap senior se bhi baat kar lo main ek baar arrange karwa deta hu kyuki mere paas jo cheeze hain main wahi kar sakta hu na sir. Mere paas refund karne ka process nahi hota hai.
Customer: Nahi wo aap dekh lo please main aap senior se jo meri aap logo ke internal team ne hi jo baat ki hai wahi maine aapko bataya hai aur jisne kya kya hai aap khud dekh lo mere ko jo refund ke liye bola gaya tha policy hai to maine isliye full payment kiya nahi to karte hi nahi full payment main monthly plan leta.
Executive: Sir aapke paas koi mail pada hua hai jo jinhone wo likh ke diya tha aapko ki refund policy hai. Aap mujhe ek baar provide karoge details. Kahan pe unhone likh ke diya tha.
Customer: Mere paas to main abhi main check kar leta hu agar hoga to hard copy mere paas hoga proof to main bata dunga otherwise jinhone mera matlab process kiya hai aap unka naam check kar lo. First jaise mere paas email jo aayi hai kisne mera payment karwaya tha kya wo aap check karke fir internally aap baat karna unse. Lekin main sure hu mere se kaha gaya tha tabhi maine full payment kiya tha ye main 100% sure hu.
Executive: Sir ek baar main senior se baat karta hu sir. Aap baat kar lo ki inke account ko kisne payment wagera process karaya tha unhone is tarah koi commitment di thi kya.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requests a refund for the subscription.

- Claims executive promised refund if business didn't run.

- States company record will be spoiled in market.



Resolution:

- Executive will arrange a call back.

- Executive will verify internally with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after verification.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, payment, verification
